channel.title: Delta source help
channel.description: Ok, I want to change my home have all the npc's at the new home but you use the varrock tele to get home and how do I change how and were do I change it at?? :confused: any help will be appricated.

item.title: Delta source help
item.dc:creator: @zxcv12 zxcv12
item.description:
@zxcv12 wrote:

I was asking for help lmao

Read full topic

item.title: Delta source help
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote="~IMxoxoxIM~, post:6, topic:251066"][quote author=Xile Maizez link=topic=331276.msg2586730#msg2586730 date=1229552182]
Yeah, go into clickingMost.java, press CTRL + F and search for:

case 4140:

Change the script to:

c.triggerTele(3104, 9312, 0);
break;
case 50235:
c.triggerTele(3104, 9312, 0);
break;

And yes, replace 50235, with what you currently have, Its the Ancient Magic’s First Teleport.

Dont forget to change c.triggerTele(XXXX, YYYY, 0);

[/quote]
That’s considered SpoonFeeding.
We are not a spoon feeding community, read the rules.

The only necessary reply is,

ClickingMost class.[/quote]

That’s if you want the topic owner to think you’re a douche, why not help people when they ask for it?

Read full topic

item.title: Delta source help
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

Yeah, go into clickingMost.java, press CTRL + F and search for:

case 4140:

Change the script to:

c.triggerTele(3104, 9312, 0);
break;
case 50235:
c.triggerTele(3104, 9312, 0);
break;

And yes, replace 50235, with what you currently have, Its the Ancient Magic’s First Teleport.

Dont forget to change c.triggerTele(XXXX, YYYY, 0);

He means how does he change the Varrock Teleport in magic book to go to home your going to have to go into clickingMost.java and look for the Varrock teleport you can search varrock but idk

item.title: Delta source help
item.dc:creator: @cmckiller cmckiller
item.description:
@cmckiller wrote:

ok first off mate you go to client.java

search (“home”)
and it should say something like else if command(“home”) or something like that

then a little further down there is some co ordinates…
just change them co ordinates to the co ordinates you want and save compile restart and it should work…
but remember to make a backup of it before you do so

Read full topic
